metadata.title: USN-6519-1 -- EC2 hibagent update
metadata.description: The EC2 hibagent package has been updated to add IMDSv2 support, as IMDSv1 uses an insecure protocol and is no longer recommended.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6519-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ec2-hibinit-agent - 1.0.0-0ubuntu4~18.04.6+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
